thread.title: Philippines shuts off its most popular island

title: Philippines shuts off its most popular island
text:
Philippines shuts off its most popular island 3:30am IST - 01:20 
Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte approved a tourist ban in the country's most famous island, Boracay, for six months from April 26. Michelle Hennessy reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte approved a tourist ban in the country's most famous island, Boracay, for six months from April 26. Michelle Hennessy reports.
